summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 1 February to end of Tuesday 1 February GMT
description: Tuesday is forecast to be mostly overcast.<br/><br/>A fresh westerly Atlantic breeze throughout the day should ensure good dispersion of any local pollution emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
